about_the_game:
You've got your hands on the phone of your towns most popular playboy! With the football star off on a week-long hiking trip, you have full control of his contacts and conversations, including even your sister, who has exchanged more than just messages with him.

Will you pull harmless pranks or take things to a more daring level as you chat with his admirers?

Dive into an ultra-realistic chat-simulation game where your decisions drive the outcome. With a week of unlimited access, how far will you go?

In this ultra-realistic chat-sim, you gain access to a simulated phone filled with various apps. But there's a catch: You only have one week to make the most of it! Decide who to interact with and navigate dynamic conversations where every choice you make shapes the story’s outcome. Will you prank, build relationships, or push boundaries?

Photo-Realistic Art Powered by AI or drawn Anime-Style
Experience handcrafted dialogues paired with ultra-realistic AI-generated photos, delivering a truly authentic experience. Alternatively the game can be experienced in drawn anime-style.

True Simulation
You have full control. Decide who to chat with in your limited time, and every word you choose can alter the course of the story. How deep can you explore each relationship?

Realistic Apps and Simulated Hacking
Beyond the chat app, explore a variety of phone apps, and even hack into Mark’s cloud storage to uncover hidden encrypted photos.

Rogue-Lite Elements
Perform well during the week, and you'll unlock bonuses for future playthroughs. Can you achieve the perfect endings for every character?

content_descriptors.notes: The game simulates realistic chat conversations by adults. Players can choose to engage in discussions around sexual topics, but all graphical content on Steam remains non-explicit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum 1280x720 screen resolution
